item.description:
We'll be venturing out to "City Lights," a public poetry reading with Sam Cornish and also featuring Quinlan and Dorio of the Carpenter Poets. No cost to attend but the refreshments you purchase at your table. Bring your own poems for the open mic. Since we'll be at a coffee shop, we may elect to look at our own writing as per usual in our own workshop after the reading. Let's play it by ear.

The organizers sent over a flier for the event, which you can view or download from the Files section of this Meetup site: http://files.meetup.c....
item.name: Reading: City Lights at Cafenation
